body_html:
Thank you for your fast reply.
I draw two different types multi-layer bidirectional LSTM.
I think the type 2 in the figure is supported now using " nn.LSTM(nlayers=2, bidirectional=True)"
My request is the type 1 model which is totally independent forward and backward layers.

Thank you
body_text:
Thank you for your fast reply.

body:
Thank you for your fast reply.
I draw two different types multi-layer bidirectional LSTM. 
I think the type 2 in the figure is supported now using " nn.LSTM(nlayers=2, bidirectional=True)"
My request is the type 1 model which is totally independent forward and backward layers.

Thank you
 

![2kinds_of_multilayer_bidirectional_lstm](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14052287/35610748-dd41a23a-06a5-11e8-803e-c577359c372b.jpg)
